Launch Instructions

Launch Builder on Windows

Double-click on the "

builder.bat
" file or run it from a command prompt.

Launch Builder on Mac

Ctrl-click or right-click on the 

builder
file in Finder and then select "Open". When prompted, select "Open". Or from a Terminal, run "
./builder ui
".

Launch Builder on Linux

Double-click on the "

builder
" file or run "
./builder ui
" in a shell.
